title: [Help me] You did good in lane, now what?
body:
So this happens more often than not but, I've had a lot of games in which I'll do really good in lane, either by CS or getting multiple kills - Which is good right? - but when team fights come around, I get no peels from my team and get heavily focused by the enemy team. 

I've had many games in which I've come out 5-1, 5-0 (or among those lines) but then I'll end up 9-7 or even worse 5-7+ at the end of the game (which I end up losing).

I'm trying to see if there's anything I can do better to avoid this. I hate losing games after doing great in lane. I know the no peels and being fed scenarios are more common on low elo (like moi's) but still, I'm just trying to win games and being ahead in gold vs my opponents is not cutting it.

Any tips or constructive criticism are very welcome. Thanks.
